item.title: Apollo Warns of Risks to Regional Banks from Commercial Real Estate
item.description: Apollo Warns of Risks to Regional Banks from Commercial Real Estate Apollo Global Management Inc.’s chief economist, Torsten Slok, has warned that regional banks could be vulnerable to a decline in commercial real estate prices. Slok says that regional banks have lent heavily to commercial real estate developers, and that these loans could become sour if property values decline.
